title: Clinical Genomics Laboratory Services
description: Your clinical genomics service provider for a range of genomic laboratory services to support drug discovery, precision medicine and clinical development.
cleaned_text: Solutions a leading drug discovery and development laboratory services organization.](javascript:;) Our innovative solutions encompass ADME, bioanalytical, genomics, immunoassay testing, vaccines, antibody drug discovery, and central laboratory services, including flow cytometry, anatomic pathology, molecular and companion diagnostics, and decentralized clinical trials. - [Our Brands](javascript:;) -
